Stop-loss strategy: Stop loss triggered when ROE falls below 15% or EPS falls below 0.8, and/or if the stock price drops by more than 10%
If the stock price falls by more than 8% from the current price, or if the ROE and EPS show significant declines.
Trigger a sell order when the stock price falls by 15% or more from the current price, and/or if the ROE and ROA indicators show a consistent decline.
Sell when the stock price falls below the 50-day moving average or if the ROE and ROA indicators show significant deterioration.
Stop loss at 20% below current price, sell when ROE drops to 10%
